mapper.insert: INSERT INTO team (topic_id, leader_id, team_name, status, create_time) VALUES (#{topicId}, #{leaderId}, #{teamName}, #{status}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT t.*, tp.title as topic_title, u.name as leader_name, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM team_member tm WHERE tm.team_id = t.id) as member_count FROM team t LEFT JOIN topic tp ON t.topic_id = tp.id LEFT JOIN user u ON t.leader_id = u.id WHERE t.id = #{id}

SELECT t.*, tp.title as topic_title, u.name as leader_name, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM team_member tm WHERE tm.team_id = t.id) as member_count FROM team t LEFT JOIN topic tp ON t.topic_id = tp.id LEFT JOIN user u ON t.leader_id = u.id WHERE t.topic_id = #{topicId}

AND t.team_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{teamName}, '%')
ORDER BY t.create_time DESC
